SEARCH
Package hms.ui

Class MenuNavigator

Object
AbstractMenu
MenuNavigator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIElement
public class MenuNavigator extends AbstractMenu
MenuNavigator class is a class that allows the user to navigate through the menus. It keeps track of the history of the menus visited by the user.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Stack<AbstractMenu>
    history
    The stack to keep track of the history of the menus visited by the user.
    private final HashMap<String,UserOption>
    navigatorOptions
    The options available to the user in the current menu.

  • Field Details

    • history

      private final Stack<AbstractMenu> history
      The stack to keep track of the history of the menus visited by the user.

    • navigatorOptions

      private final HashMap<String,UserOption> navigatorOptions
      The options available to the user in the current menu.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuNavigator

      public MenuNavigator()
      Initializes the MenuNavigator class.

      It initializes the navigatorOptions with the "Back" option.

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentMenu

      public AbstractMenu getCurrentMenu()
      Returns the current menu.
      Returns:
      The current menu.

    • addMenu

      public void addMenu(AbstractMenu menu)
      Adds a menu to the history stack. This method is used to navigate to a new menu.
      Parameters:
      menu - The menu to be added to the history stack.

    • popMenu

      public void popMenu()
      Pops the current menu from the history stack. This method is used to navigate back to the previous menu. If the history stack has only one menu, it does nothing.

    • updateOptions

      private void updateOptions()
      Updates the options available to the user based on the current menu. This is to update the display of the options with the options available in the current menu.

    • hasOption

      public boolean hasOption(String key)
      Checks if the given key is an option in the current menu or in the history.
      Overrides:
      hasOption in class AbstractMenu
      Parameters:
      key - The key to check if it is an option.
      Returns:
      True if the key is an option, false otherwise.

    • executeOption

      public void executeOption(String key)
      Executes the option with the given key. If the key is not an option in the navigator, it checks in the history options and executes the option if found.
      Overrides:
      executeOption in class AbstractMenu
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the option

    • display

      public void display(boolean showOptions)
      Displays the current menu. If showOptions is true, it displays the options available to the user. The overridden display method displays the current menu and the options available.
      Parameters:
      showOptions - Whether to display the options or not.
